title: ~ Recently Renovated - Studio/ 1 bath ~ JULY move in! $500 Discount!
posting_body: ['This apartment is in a prime Wrigleyville location, just being down the block from Wrigley Field.', 'The newly renovated unit has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, hardwood flooring, built in microwave and dishwasher, refrigerator, a ceiling fan, Ptac AC unit, crown molding, and complimentary wired internet.', 'Trash removal and water included in rent.', 'NEARBY LOCATIONS', '&', 'gt; Sheridan Red line stop, Sheridan & Irving Park X9, 80, and 151 buses, Broadway & Irving Park 36 and 80 buses', '&', 'gt; Whole Foods, Jewel Osco, Walgreens, Target', '&', 'gt; Wrigley Field and Clark St', '&', 'gt; Tons of restaurants, shops, bars, and nightlife!', 'BUILDING FEATURES', '&', 'gt;', 'Secured access entry', '&', 'gt; Elevator', '&', 'gt;', 'Fitness center', '&', 'gt;', 'Laundry room', '&', 'gt;', 'Secure access bike storage', '&', 'gt; 24 hour maintenance engineers', '&', 'gt; Pet cats allowed', '> Complimentary wired internet', 'Please Contact for more information', 'Caiden Purcell', 'BJB Properties Inc.', '224-500-7624', 'Email, Call, or Text', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pictures are for marketing purposes and may not represent the exact unit available', 'Prices subject to change']
